The party is completely exhausted and must rest.
Exhausted
The party is fresh and can keep on traveling.
Fresh
The party is slightly tired but can keep traveling.
Impeded
The party travels quickly (36 miles per day), at the expense of stealth and perception.
Fast
The party travels at a normal pace (24 miles a day), striking a good balance between speed and awareness of its surroundings.
Normal
The party travels slowly (16 miles per day), paying more attention to the surroundings and being less noticeable.
